English: Happy birthday, Phillop!
Happy birthday. Haha.
Thank you, my barbarian friends!
How did you know that I like to drink with people? Haha!
Oh, I'm pretty sure everyone knows that the dwarven king is quite the heavy drinker.
If it's not us barbarians, then who would dare to drink with the dwarven king?
This is my treat! Please drink all you want!
I have more than enough cash! I can pay for almost anything!
Now now, don't underestimate the dwarven king, my friends!
If I drink seriously, you might go bankrupt! I hope you're prepared!
1st round
5th round
13th round
So this Draconic Army marched in from the other side of Trina Hills! Their 35th attempt, I believe!
And you know what I did?! Let me tell you what I did! I chucked this axe!!! And it crooshed rite through da skulls!
You should have seen their faces! They ran away like chickens!! Ehehehe!
I thought you said the 28th attack was the last one.
Hahaha! Guess somebody wasn't listening! 35th was da last one!
Hm... Seems that the heavy drinker title was more of a self-proclaimed title.
So I came home right? From such a victory. A victory so huge!
My daughters told me to goooo awwway! They said I was too sweaty and smelly!
How could they! I'm their father!! Wah!!
Hey Gau, let's leave.
I don't think he should drink anymore.
B-but he's crying... We can't just leave him-
Waaaaittt!!!
What the!
I have one more... important story to tell you!
This is a big secret. I'm gonna say it quietly.
I'm only telling this to you, my friends.
So the Draconic Army marched in from the other side of Trina Hills! It was their 41st attack on us!
Hey Juno, here's the payment.
Could you take him to a room? He's very drunk at the moment.
Gosh! Phillop! You drank too much again!
Wake up! You should go back to your kingdom!
Yesssssss. So much work to do!! Must *hic*! Go back!
It's so hard to be a kiiing!
Have to use my brain all the time! *sobs*
Next life, I don't want to *hic* be a king!
Singing!
Yes, I love singing! Next life, I will sing!
Singer!!! I shall become the best dwarf singer!!!
Yeah yeah, whatever.
Hey Juno! Can you give us one more steak?!
I'm coming!
You stay here for a while. Don't you dare drink anymore!
Smash the enemies! Stand proud! The pride of the dwarves!!â™¬
Ughh dammit!
So noisy!
That old goat is the same as 100 years ago!
You want to become a singer?! Then drink this and sing those songs in your dreams!
Wow! This be a very good booze!!
Verrrry niiice!!! Hahaha!!!
Yeah!
I'm Phillop, the greatest dwarf man in the world!
Draconic? Mad dragons? Just a sack of meat for me!
Come at me all you want,
but my headbutt is the strongest of them all!!
My headbutt is the strongest of them all...
Hey, wake up!!!
What a mess... What kind of dream is he in?!
zZZ...
Yesterday Night
Hey Roi, what day is it today?
Do I have to tell you everything all the time? Figure it out yourself next time.
Today is the 30... No, it's the 31st actually.
Ohhhh I seeee! Why is it that I'm excited about tomorrow?
...You better not ask me the same thing next time. Figure it out yourself.
Kasel, Frey, do you have a moment to spare?
What is it?
Mind doing me a favor, you two?
The Next Day
Hey Frey!
Do you know what day it is todayyy?
Today? I don't know. Is something special going on today?
Oh right, I almost forgot. I should go to the forest to grab some firewood!
Oh wow, Frey is so bad at lying!
Look at these guys, pretending to be all busy and caught up with something...
It doesn't have to be a surprise party, tee hee.
But oh well, I guess they want to make this great archmage's party something to remember.
Oh, hi Cleo.
Kasel! What's that thing?
I-it's a slime! We are going to make a slime pudding today!!
Frey!!! I got the slime!
Awwww, they are both so cute!
Looks like they're busy preparing for my party.
I'm gonna go out and pretend nothing's happening tonight!
(Huh?)
Guys? I'm home!
Oh, welcome back. Have you had dinner?
We called you but you were nowhere to be found. So we ate first.
Huhhh?!
We left yours though. Make sure to eat everything, okay?
Hang on, what do you mean you all ate already?
How about the party??
Hmm? Party? What party?
A party for my bir-
(Hang on, there's no way Frey would eat first without me.)
(Ha! So she just tricked me into believing that she ate first!)
Nevermind, it's fine Frey. I actually had dinner outside!
Oh, is that so? Then I'll clean everything.
O-okay!!
(Wow, she's putting a lot of effort. I should at least try to look surprised.)
(So when are they all going to reveal the party? Now?)
...!! (Must be now!!)
(What the... It's almost midnight.)
(Don't tell me they don't know it's my birthday today...)
(But Roi knows my birthday. I'm sure he told everyone!)
I thought we were all friends...
They all just seem fine without me, though.
My birthday is nothing... to them...
Happy birthday, Cleo!!!
W-what is this...?
Cleo.. Are you crying?!
I told you all that it might actually hurt Cleo's feelings!!
Cleo, actually...
It's past midnight. Now is the start of the first day of August.
I thought you said that the day before yesterday was the 31st?
That's why I told you to check the dates yourself.
Roi actually told us before about your birthday.
We wanted to gather and hold a birthday party, but Roi stopped us...
W-what?! Roi!!!! Why would you do something like that?!
(You aren't alone anymore. I did it to make you stop being so insecure.)
(That's what I want to say, but I don't think I can.)
That's just how I congratulate someone. I learned to do it that way.
Calm down, Cleo!
Also, why are you are so mean, Roi?!
At least try and comfort her!! Apologize too!!
Nah.
Kyaah! Cleo!
Y-you're going to burn everything down! Please calm down!
I'm going to roast him!!!!!! I will have your roasted body as the main dish!!!!!!
*Yawn*! Today is a boring day...
When will sis come? She told me she would come visit...
So nothing good today either.
Is there really, truly no gift good enough to give Epigael? *Sigh*
Hmm?
An elf? What is an elf doing in a place like this?
Hmm? Oh!!
Hello!! Are you here to order an artifact? Please say yes!
Artifact?
Do you even realize who you are talking to?
Of course! You are a dark elf! I'm Dosarta, a royal elven princess!
Now, since you are here, I will make you an awesome artifact!
What is this...?
Hmmm... You don't like this? Then how about this?
How about this, and this?!
It's all right, you can stop making more.
(Strange... I thought elves were all impudent beings like that elf from before...)
(I did not expect to see an elf like this one. Could it be that the elves have changed after a hundred years?)
(Not sure if I should call her relaxed, or dense.)
(Her skills though... These are all pretty good. Perhaps one of these could make Epigael happy.)
(What should I pick, though?)
Um, Mr. Dark Elf?
(W-what should I do? He must not like any of them...)
(I can't believe that I disappointed the first customer in a long time...)
*Sobs* I'm so sorry...
Hmm?
Wait, why are you crying?
I'm so sorry... I wanted to make you something awesome, but it looks like none of them were satisfactory... *sniffle*
It was my birthday today, so I wanted to make something good for you...
Waaaaaah! I'm so sorry!!
Hey, stop...
Ugh, what a pain. What should I do?
Dosarta! I'm so sorry for being lat-
Wait, you are that rude dark elf from before!!
You are that insolent elf from before!
Sis!! Waaaah!!
I made a mistake again, waaaah!!
Why did you make my sister cry, you filthy dark elf?!
This is a misunderstanding! I didn't make her cry!
And wait, you are that elf's sister?!
How could you be late for your sister's birthday?! You should be ashamed of yourself!
What did you just say?!
*Sobs* please don't fight...
So... Mr. Dark Elf is angry... about sis being late to my birthday?
I heard that all dark elves were cold and remorseless... I don't think that's true.
Ahhhh! No, this is not the time to think! I should clear up this misunderstanding!
What should I do, what should I do?!!
Sis, Mr. Dark Elf!! Stop fighting!!
Na-na-na... Na-na!
Na-na-na... Na-na... Lalala... Tee hee.
Epis... she looks happy today...
Maybe she's planning something.
It doesn't look that way to me...
I'm all ready now!! See you later!!
Huh? You're leaving? To where?
I'm gonna go have some fun! Today is my birthday, you know? Tee hee!
Demons have birthdays too?
Nope, but I've decided to make mine! Today is the day I first came to the material world long time ago!
I'm gonna have some fun, Jane! You have fun with those guys!
Okay...
Why didn't she tell us to have fun?
I thought you hated her. Why do you care?
I guess I don't know you that well.
It's not like that!! Aren't you angry?! She ignored us completely!!
...Birthday...
Lady Jane? Is something bothering you?
Epis... I want to buy her a present.
Epis has been taking good care of me. I want to repay her.
My lady...
Take care of you? Come on, she literally just left you so she can go party.
I will do as you wish, milady. I will see if I can find something that she would like.
Oi, are you even listening to me?
Thank you, Theo.
Great... Guess no one's listening.
Arghhh! Whatever! Hey! Wait for me!
So what are you gonna get her? Have you given it some thought?
A dress... A beautiful dress.
Epis is beautiful... I want to give her a beautiful dress that matches her beauty.
Not bad. You know where you can buy that?
...You seriously don't know where you can buy a dress?
What you looking at? Can't I at least have a chat with your lady?
Go on.
Um...
Don't tell me...
You want me to find you a tailor?
You're the only one who knows where to get this kind of thing. Please.
*Sigh* Great...
...Please... I want to buy her a pretty gift.
...Fine. Just follow me closely.
Kyahaha!! That was so much fun!
It's been a while since I've had that much fun!
Hmm? Where's everyone?
Why do you all look so tired? Did something happen?
Happy birthday, Epis.
Your present... I want to give you this.
Whoa!! What's this?!
Awww honey, did you prepare a birthday gift for me? Thank you so much!
You've been looking after me all this time, Epis...
Theo and Ezekiel also helped. Together, we bought this present.
...This is the least I can do for someone who looked after her ladyship.
Hey, I just followed them because I was bored. Don't get the wrong idea.
Hahaha! Look who's shy!
Thank you everyone! This dress is soooo pretty!
I didn't think I would ever receive such a gift. Thank you, Jane.
Wait, what are you doing? Get off her ladyship!
Hey I'm the one who did the most work! Thank me too, dream demon!
Can a carrot really grow in a place like this?
Of course it can! Don't tell me you thought the barbarians eat nothing but meat!
This isn't an ordinary carrot. It's able to grow large even in the snow.
But I'm not seeing anything but snow here... *Cough*
We didn't come all the way here for nothing. Let's start looking for it.
Do you have anything more to tell us about this 'Everlasting Carrot'?
Most of the tales surrounding that carrot are considered fairytales. They say that this carrot grows on shadowed ground, and there's bound to be glittering dust floating around it.
Wow, it must be really pretty. I'm sure we won't have much problem finding it if there's glittering dust!
I know, right? Maybe we'll even find it faster than we think we will.
Let's go to that side for now. I know a place with a lot of shadowy ground. The mountain's shadow covers wide areas over there.
I'm right behind you!
Nothing...
Not even a single blade of grass...
Well, since Windland is huge, it's gonna take a while to find it...
Hmm? Oh, I smell something sweet.
It smells like a flower... Hmm? A rose?
A rose in a place like this?! That means a carrot could grow here too!
*Roar*!
Huh?
Kyahhhh!
Run!!
Huff, huff, huff, huff... What was that? It was so strong...
Could it be the monster guarding the flower?
Yeah, I think so. Maybe that's the Rose of Eternity I've heard rumors of. A rose that never withers.
Really? That's so romantic! We could sell it for a high price!
Haha, good to see that cheered you up. Let's take a rest for a moment and then leave, shall we?
We should hurry. We need to find it by the end of today.
She's right! We don't want to be late to the party! Let's go!
Hey May, that's not the right direction! Oh wow that girl is fast...
Yanne? Juno? Oh, I see something glittering over there...
Kyahhhh!
Ti-tiger...?
May! Run!
Huff, huff, huff... Why are there so many monsters around here? We're just here for a carrot...
*Sob* I-I'm so sorry... I should've been more careful.
It's not your fault. We're just having a bad day.
Anyway, the sun is going to set soon. Maybe today is not the day... I really wanted to give Luna that nice carrot as a present...
Did you say Luna?
Yes, Luna. It's Luna's birthday so-
Yanne? Is something wrong?
L-luna?! Why are you here?
Luna followed nice smell! Nice and fresh smell!
I want to take it, but it's too heavy for Luna to carry...
Wait, could that be...
Everlasting Carrot huh? Did it get its name because it grows on for like forever?
Everlasting Carrot? This carrot has a name? You wanted to give this to Luna?
Yeah. Didn't think you'd find it first though...
Yay! Thank you! Yanne is Luna's best friend!
Alright, so let's pull that thing out.
YAY! Carrot! Biiiiiiig carrot!
I will make you a carrot cake with this when we get back to Orvel. Happy birthday, Luna!
Happy birthday, Luna! Just cut a piece and put it in my basket!
Glad this ended nicely! Happy birthday, Luna. Sorry I can only do something like this.
Really wish I could guide you to your real home...
It's okay! Luna misses mommy, daddy, and friends a lot,
but Luna has good friends here too! Luna is not lonely at all! Thank you!
Oomph. Another fine day it is! Silvervine was delivered properly as well. Great!
Cleaning is done...
Oh, are the customers already coming?
I should get ready then!
Yo, Gladi!
Gladi?
Hey Gladi!
Heyyyy!
Ahhh! Huh?
Wake up! Get me that essence box.
Hmm? Oh, sure. Oomph!
You look so different from back when you were going crazy in the arena. If you're that bored and unmotivated, why don't you just go back?
Nah, I had enough. Besides, it's more fun to watch the new faces going up the rank.
That's too bad... Tell me when you have changed your mind!
Sure thing! Take care!
Well I have to admit that I'm a bit rusty these days...
Hey! Gimme that thing!
Huh?
Don't just stand there! Just give me the usual!
I don't think I saw you in the shop before...
C'mon! How are you going to do business if you don't even know your regular's face?!
Regular? I don't remember you. There's no way I wouldn't remember a regular customer's-
Stupid mutt! Who do you think you are? Do you know how many years I've been to the arena?
Gladi, you alright? I've never seen anyone who would call a lynx hybrid a mutt. Not even a cat?
Yer still a champion alright! He couldn't do anything even when yer going easy on him.
Serves him a'ight, that toxic bastard!
Nah, I just scared him off. Anyways, what can I do for you? Need something?
Oh, right! Yer fancy moves almost made meself forget.
I want... Wait, you haven't used all those silvervines yet, have you?!
Well, I did tell you before I have them delivered for personal use...
Give me three sets of artifact pieces!
Hey wait, I'm first! I'm going to fuse and craft that artifact this time!
Thankfully, I have enough stock today... Oomph.
So who's first? Oh, looks like no one's listening.
Tell me when you guys are done fighting... Zzz
*Yawn*! Oh, time really flew!
I'm gonna wrap things up and-
Hmph, still fast I see.
Hey, why did you make a mess out of my store?!
You seriously don't know what day it is today? I know you've been lazy lately but wow...
You could use a good fight on a day like this.
A day like this? What's so special about today? The day I finally got enough silvervines delivered?
Come on, I was just kidding! So what day is today exactly?
Today is your...
Your...
My what?
Argh! Nevermind! Just bring it on already!
Fine by me, but what in the world is today exactly?!
I've served this nation as a holy knight for many, many years...
I always told myself that I would retire upon reaching the age of 65 and focus on managing the orphanage...
but somehow, I have yet to take off this armor.
But today is my 71st birthday.
This time...
I will have my retirement.
So don't stop me now!!!
The commander's at it again! Stop him!
Sir, you shouldn't! You are still going healthy and strong!
Back off! I'm going to meet with Great Priestess Iris and get her to place her seal!
Don't stop me!
It's no use talking!! Everyone grab him!!
Ugh! He's too strong! We're outmatched!
Ahhhhhhh!!
Your Excellency!! Great Priestess Iris!!
Please place your seal upon this retirement documen-
Happy birthday, grandpa!!
Happy birthday!!!
Hahaha, were you surprised, grandpa?
Her Excellency, the Great Priestess Iris, told us that today is your 71st birthday.
She told us that she will call you here for a surprise birthday party...
You really did come, grandpa!
We actually just came together, right before you stepped in.
Hahaha, these days it's hard for us all to gather like this.
Sonia and Mirianne are here too, grandpa.
We were investigating in Galluah, but
we arrived here in time thanks to Sonia's magic. *giggles*
.. Heh, it's no big deal.
Are you just planning to stand still forever, grandpa?
... (Just when did her Excellency come up with such plan?
Wait, did she predict that I would come to ask her for my retirement...?)
Hmm.. Oh, hohoho... Thank you, my children.
Any of you know where her Excellency is? You said she's the one who planned this.
Oh, unfortunately, after she decided to call you, she told us that she had to go somewhere.
Her Excellency is always so busy, haha!!
*Sigh* so today is not the day...
Oh, hahaha! It's nothing!
I was just so surprised by the party.
Now now, let us all enjoy these delicious-looking foods before they get cold.
(I will get my retirement sooner or later, your Excellency... Just you wait. *sigh*)
RETIREMENT!!!
Stop running, thief!!!
Nooo! Stay away from me, you monster!!
Not a chance!! Take this!!!
Aaack!!!
Thank you so much.
That thief took my bag so suddenly and I didn't know what to do...
It's alright!
I just did what was right as a citizen of the empire.
Still, I cannot send you away empty-handed.
Now let's see... Where were my coins again?
Sir, you don't have to-
Now don't say that.
I'm sure they were... Oh, here they are.
Take this as a token of my grati- hmm? Where did she go?
Phew, it's so hard to convince someone like that.
It's not like I'm doing this for a reward.
But... He reminded me of grandpa Ricardo. Gentle and calm.
Oh if it isn't my lovely granddaughter! Happy birthday!!
Have you been well?
Of course, he he. I'm glad to see that you look alright.
You didn't have to come all the way here just to say happy birthday...
Don't you worry about me dear, haha.
Here, your present.
Ohhh, a harmonica.
Thanks, grandpa! He he.
Why a harmonica though?
You father told me that you've been training a lot these days.
It's good to train with a goal in mind, but anything too much is not good.
I'm giving you this harmonica to tell you that it's good to take a break once in a while, and not rush into things. Haha.
To think of it, today is my birthday!
How could I forget that? Perhaps I've been too busy lately, hehe.
I don't think grandpa will be coming this time though...
Since it's my birthday today, I should finish patrolling earlier.
Nooo! Help!
...Literally no rest for the wicked, huh?
Then there's no rest for justice too!
I'm coming for you, villains!
Oh no! It's the Crimson Wind! Runnnn!!!
